channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases. See Global News' Lauren Pullen reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 71 Edmonton Zone 48 South Zone 18 Central Zone 17 North Zone 33 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Sat, Apr 24, 2021. AHS non-school outbreak data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Current Covid-19 VOC Cases in Alberta Active VOC cases 12299 300 VOC Percentage 61.1% 0.177% Total VOC cases 24509 932 Total VOC recovered 12142 630 Total deaths from VOC 68 2 VOC specimens screened 47812 1044 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Sat, Apr 24, 2021
